param.name: repo_name
param.label: Repository Name
param.help: Enter the DVC-configured Github repository that you would like to run.

param.name: git_username
param.label: Github Username
param.help: Enter the username of the owner of the above Github repository.

param.name: storage_name
param.label: DVC Remote Storage Name
param.help: Type the name of your DVC-configured remote storage.

param.name: resource
param.label: Resource Name
param.help: Select a resource to run your DVC-configured Github repository on.

param.name: model_setting
param.label: ML Model Setting
param.help: Select whether you would like to train the ML model and push it to cloud, or download and run the model from cloud.

param.name: user_script_name
param.label: Script to Run
param.help: Enter the script name which runs the ML model. Input is discarded if ML Model Setting is set to "Train".
